name: Pocket Plants
description:
Use your mouse to traverse relaxing otherworldly environments and gather different plants to plant throughout the world to restore the area by collecting, planting and watering. Mushroom boy is on a mission and he won't stop until all the fog is cleared from the area by using plants in the area.

In a minigame, take care of plants collected in different levels within the greenhouse area.

Project created by students. Support aspiring young individuals that want to join the industry by giving the game a like and a download!
